item.title: Event Handling
item.description: Intro to DOM Events Events - Responding to user inputs and actions Types of events:(some of the many) clicks, drags, drops, hovers,scrolls, form submissions, key press, focus/blur mousewheel, double click, copying, pasting, audio start, screen resize, printing etc. Note: All events follow a similar pattern Pattern: The thing Event type Code to run button click change the color input hits return get the search results image mouseover display img caption for more info visit MDN Event reference
